FuncDef: The reset mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics command deletes statistics about hard pipe traffic on the AC side.
CLIs: reset mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } [ outbound ]
reset mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } [ inbound ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics interface GigabitEthernet1/0/1 inbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To delete statistics about hard pipe traffic on the AC side, run the reset mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics command.
